# Day 3: Symmetry & Tilings

## The Folding Algorithm

To create symmetric patterns, we **fold** points into a fundamental domain:

```glsl
// Fold across vertical line at x = 0
if (p.x < 0.0) p.x = -p.x;

// Fold across horizontal line at y = 0
if (p.y < 0.0) p.y = -p.y;
```

## Half-Space Reflections

A half-space is defined by a line. We reflect points to one side:

```glsl
float halfspace(vec2 p, vec2 normal, float offset) {
    return dot(p, normal) - offset;
}

vec2 reflect_halfspace(vec2 p, vec2 normal, float offset) {
    float d = halfspace(p, normal, offset);
    if (d < 0.0) p -= 2.0 * d * normal;
    return p;
}
```
